helloldap.scripts.serve¶

CLI to start the server.

class helloldap.scripts.serve.Runner(server)[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the CLI wrapper to start the server.

Parameters:server – Instance of the server to start.
init_runner(args, lgg=None)[source]¶

Initialises runner with logger, console, rc.

Logger and rc are passed to the server.

Parameters:
  • args – Namespace of parsed CLI arguments
  • lgg – Inject a logger, or keep the default module logger
run()[source]¶

Run, Lola, run.

helloldap.scripts.serve.main(argv=None)[source]¶
helloldap.scripts.serve.parse_args(runner, argv)[source]¶
